requirements: Biometric information at visa application center or via mobile app

special_notes: Applicants need to verify travel purpose to select appropriate visa type.
Processing times may vary, check for updates before application.
united kingdom.embassy_info: Visa applications can often be submitted online via the official GOV.UK website.

visa_requirement.validity_period: depends on visa type (short-term or long-term)
visa_requirement.cost: varies by visa type and applicant's age
requirements: Passport with over 3 months validity post exit
Educational certificates for student visa applications

special_notes: Official translations of documents into English, French, or other accepted languages may be required.
france.embassy_info: Visa applications need to be submitted to the nearest French embassy/consulate or authorized visa application center.

special_notes: Applicants may need to attend a visa interview at a US embassy/consulate
united states.embassy_info: Applications are processed through the US Embassy or Consulate in the applicant's residence country.

visa_requirement.processing_time: varies based on visa type and application completeness
requirements: passport with minimum 3 months validity beyond the planned stay

special_notes: Visa can be single-entry or multiple-entry, depending on the intended travel needs
Submission of biometrics at the local consulate during the interview is required
Processing time can take several weeks; apply well in advance
spain.embassy_info: Visa applications are processed by the local Spanish embassy, consulate, or visa application center
